version_description:
For this update we have improved the overall look and feel of the App and added some more 3D scan images to see your baby’s development.

If you appreciate the work we do here at Health & Parenting, please leave us a review in the Apple iTunes Store? This is one of the best ways to support us and help other parents find our Apps. Thank you!

We’re always listening so please continue to send us suggestions at support@health-and-parenting.com or send us a tweet at @health_parent

Wishing you a healthy pregnancy!

Team Health & Parenting

For this update we have improved the overall look and feel of the App and added some more 3D scan images to see your baby’s development.

If you appreciate the work we do here at Health & Parenting, please leave us a review in the Apple iTunes Store? This is one of the best ways to support us and help other parents find our Apps. Thank you!

We’re always listening so please continue to send us suggestions at support@health-and-parenting.com or send us a tweet at @health_parent

Wishing you a healthy pregnancy!

Team Health & Parenting

Small bug fix. You didn't notice it? Well it's fixed now.

Wishing you a healthy pregnancy!

Team Health & Parenting
For this update we’ve made overall performance improvements, and fixed some small bugs to improve the quality of your App experience.

For this update we’ve made overall performance improvements, and fixed some small bugs to improve the quality of your App experience.

We also added:
- Single parenting option
- New weekly images

We’re always updating Pregnancy+ with new features whilst fixing any small bugs that our 14 million+ users report to us. So please make sure you always download the latest version. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Added Italian Language
- Added Dutch Language
- Improved performance

We’re always updating Pregnancy+ for our 15 million users to make it even better! So please make sure you always download the latest version. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Italian Language improvements
- Dutch Language improvements
- Improved performance

We’re always updating Pregnancy+ for our 15 million users to make it even better! So please make sure you always download the latest version. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Improved performance
- Daily Blog is now available in Spanish and Portuguese

We regularly update Pregnancy+ for our 15 million users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Improved performance
- Better onboarding flow

We regularly update Pregnancy+ for our 15 million users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Improved performance

We regularly update Pregnancy+ for our 15 million users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Better onboarding flow

We regularly update Pregnancy+ for our 15 million users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- A complete, beautiful redesign of the app!
- Addition of a daily destination feed to support our users.
- Improved navigation.
- Improved user experience.

• 40 beautiful and fully animated 3D fetus models. These incredible scenes include full audio, info related to weekly development, and react with animations when tapped.

We regularly update Pregnancy+ for our 17 million users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:
• Pregnancy+ is now available in Arabic. Even more expectant parents and their close ones can now track their Pregnancy in their native language.
• From time to time issues occasionally sneak into the application. In this update we've fixed several of these pesky bugs to make your Pregnancy+ experience even better!

We’re always updating Pregnancy+ for our 25 million users to make it even better! So please make sure you always download the latest version. We don’t want you to miss out!

Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:
• Pregnancy+ is now available in Turkish, Czech and Japanese languages. Expectant parents and their close ones can now track their Pregnancy in their native language.

• To help you keep your private information private, we've added the option for our users to secure Pregnancy+ using Face ID and Touch ID. If your device supports these features, you can turn this on in the app's settings menu.

• From time to time issues occasionally sneak into the application. In this update we've fixed several of these pesky bugs to make your Pregnancy+ experience even better!

We’re always updating Pregnancy+ for our 21 million users to make it even better! So please make sure you always download the latest version. We don’t want you to miss out!

Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:
• Added Danish language
• Added Norwegian language
• Added Swedish language
• Added Indonesian language
• Improved performance

We’re always updating Pregnancy+ for our 20 million users to make it even better! So please make sure you always download the latest version. We don’t want you to miss out!
